message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40, considering I made the first offer.
I understand you want a larger share for proposing first. How about a 55/45 split in my favor? It's a strong offer considering the inflation.
Considering the inflation, my new offer is 58-42. It's still a good deal for you, don't let the money lose more value!
The clock is ticking and we both lose with every round. I'm proposing a 52/48 split - a fair compromise considering the time pressure and inflation.
We're running out of time! I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more for making the first offer. 56-44 is my new proposal.
